overview: "How do we survive?" This question runs in Mel’s mind as she was terminated in her job just as the pandemic started to worsen. Mel is a middle-aged single mom who is trying to live up to the expectations of society’s "what a mother should be". Jay, her son, has a drug addiction and is still mourning the loss of his father. As the pandemic strikes, their relationship blooms, so fast and so soon.
title: Mel
